        public static <T,P extends Convertable<T>> T convert(P value)
                                              throws java.text.ParseException

        抛出:
        java.text.ParseException

      • convert

        public static <T,J extends Convertable<T>> java.util.ArrayList<T> convert(J[] array)
        Converting array of convertable items into ArrayList of target items. Note: per item ParseException are ignored.
        参数:
        array - Array to convert

      • convert

        public static <T,J extends Convertable<T>> java.util.ArrayList<T> convert(java.util.Collection<J> collection)
        Converting collection of convertable items into ArrayList of target items. Note: per item ParseException are ignored.
        参数:
        collection - Collection to convert

      • convert

        public static <T extends java.lang.Enum<T>> T convert(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                                                      java.lang.String name,
                                                      T defaultValue)
        Searches for enum of given class with given name (case insensitive)
        参数:
        type - Enum class
        name - Enum constant name
        defaultValue - Default value if no enum constant with given name is found

      • create

        public static <IN,OUT> OUT create(IN obj,
                                  Creator<IN,OUT> creator)
        Creates output object using provided creator. Returns null if obj null.

                                                  Creator<IN,OUT> creator)

                                                  Creator<IN,OUT> creator)
        Creates list of output objects using provided creator

      • toArray

        public static <T> T[] toArray(java.util.Collection<T> collection)
        Converting List into array
        Note: array type is determined by class of the first non-null element in the list. If there is no elements or all elements are null, null will be returned.
        Elements in the list should be exactly of requested type, not it's descendants.

      • toArray

        public static <T> T[] toArray(java.util.Collection<T> collection,
                              java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Converting List into array of given type
